  echo = TRUE, collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>" 
  )
def_hook <- knit_hooks$get("output")
knit_hooks$set(output = function(x, options) {
  out <- def_hook(x, options)
  return(paste("\\begin{framed}\\begin{verbatim}", x, "\\end{verbatim}\\end{framed}", collapse = "\n"))
})
